english: The doom has no power on me longer .
chinese: 那个对我的诅咒已经失败了。

english: Do not swear in front of the children .

chinese: 他觉得所有人都在诅咒他。

english: Curse came home to roost, mammy said .
chinese: 嬷嬷曾说过，凡是诅咒都要回到诅咒的人自己身上来。

english: He rose exultantly from their profane surprise .
chinese: 他得意非凡地站起身来，也不管众人怎样惊奇诅咒。
诅咒造句挺难的，這是一个万能造句的方法

english: He simply looked at the sea dully and swore in an undertone .
chinese: 他只是呆呆地注视着海面低声诅咒着。

english: Then you condemn me to live wretched and to die accursed ?
chinese: 那么你就是判定我活着受罪，死后要受诅咒了？

english: The tiny village of frinley is said to possess a " cursed tree " .
chinese: 据说弗林利小村里有一棵“被诅咒”的树。

english: It also involves howls of exasperation, cursing, and gnashing of teeth .
chinese: 还包括愤激的狂笑，诅咒和咬牙切齿。

english: He longed after her, and cursed the fate which separated him from her .
chinese: 他想念着她，诅咒命运使他们不能经常聚首。

english: I suppose it seems to you a kind of curse. it must be very dismal .
chinese: 你觉得那是一种诅咒。那一定是种令人伤心的诅咒。

english: He went out with a curse stifled behind his pale, just smiling lips .
chinese: 出门时一句诅咒的话到了带笑的苍白嘴唇中间又被他咽了下去。

english: We all know the many paintings of man transformed to raging beast by the curse .
chinese: 我们都知道，许多男人被诅咒成暴怒的野兽的形象。

english: The word gentleman has tended to be a term of abuse, first cousin to snob .
chinese: 绅士这个字成了受人诅咒的名词，意思和势利鬼不相上下。
